name: Tonka Search & Rescue 2
summary: Save the day the Tonka way in fire,police, water and mountain rescues! Product Information Join the ranks of brave police officers, firefighters and rescue workers in exciting search and rescue missions. Tonka Joe needs a tough hero like you to answer the call to fight forest fires, break up traffic jams, save people stranded by floods and rescue boats lost in a storm!The game begins at the dispatch center, where Tonka Joe explains about the missions and general play. There are four areas to explore: the Fire Station,Police Department, Mountain Rescue Station and Water Rescue Station. Each of these has three missions and also features activities. The missions involve rescuing stranded animals and people, moving hazards, clearing roads, and constructing protective buildings. Kids will know they have a mission to attend to when a siren goes off on one of the stations in a random fashion, and will need to click on that building to participate.
